entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
